mapper.select: select m.sku sku,m.name,IFNULL(p.location,p.url) image, i.from_warehouse_inbound,i.from_warehouse_outbound,i.from_warehouse_fulfillable, i2.to_warehouse_inbound,i2.to_warehouse_outbound,i2.to_warehouse_fulfillable, a.* from t_erp_dispatch_oversea_form_entry a left join t_erp_dispatch_oversea_form form on form.id=a.formid left join t_erp_material m on a.materialid = m.id left join t_picture p on m.image=p.id left join ( select shopid,warehouseid,materialid , sum( case when substring_index(status,'_',1)='inbound' then quantity else 0 end ) from_warehouse_inbound, sum( case when substring_index(status,'_',1)='outbound' then quantity else 0 end ) from_warehouse_outbound, sum( case when substring_index(status,'_',1)='fulfillable' then quantity else 0 end ) from_warehouse_fulfillable from t_erp_inventory where shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and (warehouseid = #{warehouseid2,jdbcType=CHAR}) group by materialid ) i on i.materialid=m.id left join ( select shopid,warehouseid,materialid , sum( case when status like 'inbound_%' then quantity else 0 end ) to_warehouse_inbound, sum( case when status like 'outbound_%' then quantity else 0 end ) to_warehouse_outbound, sum( case when status='fulfillable' then quantity else 0 end ) to_warehouse_fulfillable from t_erp_inventory where shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and (warehouseid = #{warehouseid,jdbcType=CHAR}) group by materialid ) i2 on i2.materialid=m.id where formid = #{formid,jdbcType=CHAR}
